meanings.definition: The quality of including all or nearly all elements or aspects of something.
meanings.sent1: The comprehensiveness of the report impressed the teacher.
meanings.sent2: The comprehensiveness of the map helped us navigate easily.
meanings.sent3: The detective's investigation was so thorough, it reached a level of comprehensiveness that amazed everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of the subject was like a vast ocean of comprehensiveness, leaving no stone unturned.
meanings.sent5: The comprehensiveness of his explanation left no room for confusion.

meanings.definition: The extent to which something is complete and thorough.
meanings.sent1: The comprehensiveness of the project plan ensured its success.
meanings.sent2: The comprehensiveness of the book made it a valuable resource.
meanings.sent3: The chef's recipe had a level of comprehensiveness that even included a secret ingredient.
meanings.sent4: Her care for the garden was like the comprehensiveness of a painter finishing a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The comprehensiveness of his knowledge on the topic was truly impressive.
